biocontainers.name: sailfish
biocontainers.summary: Rapid mapping-based isoform quantification from rna-seq reads.

biotools.summary: A software tool that implements a novel, is an alignment-free algorithm for the estimation of isoform abundances directly from a set of reference sequences and RNA-seq reads.

bioschemas.name: Sailfish
bioschemas.summary: A software tool that implements a novel, is an alignment-free algorithm for the estimation of isoform abundances directly from a set of reference sequences and RNA-seq reads.
